body: Effective against daemons, demons, and fey, cold iron has been drawn from deep beneath forbidding mountains and forged with the least heat possible. Because of the delicacy and difficulty of the process, a weapon made of cold iron costs twice as much to make, and every magical enhancement increases its price significantly. It has 30 hit points per inch of thickness and hardness 10.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Binding Outsiders/Dealing with Outsiders/Anathematic Substances/Cold Iron
name: Cold Iron
